mapper.select: select code_unit as codeUnit, name from core_units

select cu.code_unit as codeUnit, cu.name, cu.code_post_unit as codePostUnit, cu2.name as namePostUnit, cu.conversion_factor as conversionFactor from core_units cu left join core_units cu2 on cu.code_post_unit = cu2.code_unit
where cu.code_unit = #{codeUnit}
mapper.insert: insert into core_units( create_date, update_date, update_user, update_program, code_unit, name, code_post_unit, conversion_factor) values ( sysdate(), sysdate(), "pgm", "UnitService", #{codeUnit}, #{name}, #{codePostUnit}, #{conversionFactor})
mapper.update: update core_units SET update_date = sysdate(), update_user = "pgm", update_program = "UnitService", name = #{name}, code_post_unit = #{codePostUnit}, conversion_factor = #{conversionFactor} where code_unit = #{codeUnit}
